definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: About 20 percent of the vaccine will be reserved for essential workers and the rest go to the public on a voluntary basis.
sentences.chinese: 有20%的疫苗将供收储，其馀面向公众自愿接种。

sentences.english: From life machines to vaccination man has vastly improve the standard of living.
sentences.chinese: 从生命机器到疫苗接种，人们大大地提高了生活水平。

sentences.english: Over 22 million doses of squalene-containing flu vaccine have been administered.
sentences.chinese: 已接种的含角鲨烯流感疫苗数量超过2200万剂。

sentences.english: After inoculation with P. yoelii, parasites disappeared naturally, but with P. berghei…
sentences.chinese: 但接种伯氏疟原虫后的阳性小鼠则不能自然转阴。

sentences.english: Results Anti HAV IgG positive rate of whole population increased significantly.
sentences.chinese: 结果疫苗接种后人群总抗体阳性率有显著的提高。

sentences.english: This photo gallery illustrates various aspects of the vaccination campaign.
sentences.chinese: 本组照片说明了疫苗接种运动的不同侧面。

sentences.english: And strict rules may even harden anti-vaccination attitudes.
sentences.chinese: 严格的规定甚至会使得反疫苗接种的态度变得强硬。

sentences.english: The bacteria could be consistently cultured for at least 14 days without losing its virulence.
sentences.chinese: 青枯菌在连续培养14天后接种致病力不减。

sentences.english: Vaccination campaigns are still on-going in a further 6 districts.
sentences.chinese: 预防接种运动在另外6个县仍在进行。

sentences.english: Conclusion Mumps and DT vaccines can be administere…
sentences.chinese: 结论两苗是可以同时接种的。

sentences.english: As to animals, they are always inoculated in time and kept according to the certain rules.
sentences.chinese: 这些动物们都被及时接种过疫苗并被精心饲养。

sentences.english: There were difference in resistance by inoculation with different strains of Aspergillus flavus.
sentences.chinese: 不同致病菌株接种，抗性反应有差异。

sentences.english: In conclusion, we confirm the efficacy of long-term HBIG immunoprophylaxis.
sentences.chinese: 结论是我们确认了长期接种乙肝免疫球蛋白的疗效。

sentences.english: Artificial inoculation techniques for false smut of rice (caused by Ustilaginoidea virens (Cooke) Takahashi) was studied under field condition.
sentences.chinese: 探索在田间条件下进行稻曲病的人工接种技术。

sentences.english: The tumor grew differently with different inoculation sites of WBT-2 tumor cells.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤接种于不同部位，生长情况也不相同。

sentences.english: The inoculated medium is then aerobically incubated to facilitate the production of cellulose.
sentences.chinese: 在接种中，然后有氧培养，促进纤维素生产。

definition: polio/abbr. for 脊髓灰質炎|脊髓灰质炎[ji3 sui3 hui1 zhi4 yan2]
epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)/abbr. for 疾病預防控製中心|疾病预防控制中心[ji2 bing4 yu4 fang2 kong4 zhi4 zhong1 xin1]
